```{r, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(adas.utils)
```


```{r}
n=6
s = 2
ftr <- LETTERS[1:n]
combn(ftr, n-s) %>% as.data.frame() %>% 
  summarize(across(everything(), ~ paste0(., collapse = ""))) %>% as_vector()
```
